latest.name: cin7-ai-playground
latest.error_message: Failed during stage 'building site': Build script returned non-zero exit code: 2
latest.title:
fix: Resolve critical TypeScript compilation errors for Netlify deployment

- Fixed SettingsPage critical issues:
  - Layout.Section variant from "twoThirds" to "oneHalf" (valid Polaris variant)
  - Theme type consistency between options and ThemeProvider
  - Added missing "as" prop to all Text components (Polaris requirement)
  - Added missing autoComplete prop to all TextField components
  - Fixed Button primaryAction tone prop from "destructive" to "critical"

- Fixed PerformanceDashboard icon imports:
  - Replaced ChartBarIcon with ChartVerticalIcon (valid Polaris icon)
  - Replaced CircleIcon with CircleRightIcon
  - Replaced AlertIcon with AlertCircleIcon
  - Replaced CurrencyDollarIcon with CashDollarIcon
  - Replaced DevicePhoneIcon with PhoneIcon
  - Fixed Badge status prop to use tone instead

- Fixed core component type issues:
  - Resolved JSX ReactNode issue in CodeGeneratorPage by wrapping NotificationComponent
  - Fixed cssFramework undefined issue by adding it to destructured parameters
  - Fixed PageConfig children property access with type guard

- Fixed service layer type conflicts:
  - Properly mapped RequestContext type between different service interfaces
  - Fixed Alert channel type handling with proper default case

These fixes address the main TypeScript compilation blockers that were preventing Netlify deployment.
